PGFX Graphics Interface


Modules

Data Structures
PGFX Primitives
Rendering Context Management

Detailed Description

The PGFX graphics library provides a single set of primitives that can render to multiple output devices. A function is called to create a context from a given output device, then any primitive may render to that context.
